title: Impression for a Sunday
post: Thank you. I have an icon of the (same) image painted on wood that I purchased many years ago at the St. Catherine’s monastery in Sinai — after seeing the 6th century original on the wall. Sitting at my desk here in Paris, I just printed out your rendition and have now placed it immediately below my painted icon on wood. No doubt in my mind; both images taken from the Shroud — one by an artist of the day, the other by you ( I surmise) with the help of the Dynamic Auto Painter program.
author: Judy
